thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton and Kate McKinnon Got Dinner This Week - Hillary Clinton and Kate McKinnon Hung Out

author: Kayleigh Roberts
title: Hillary Clinton and Kate McKinnon Got Dinner This Week - Hillary Clinton and Kate McKinnon Hung Out
text:
By Kayleigh Roberts Feb 17, 2017 For many, 2017 has been a roller coaster ride of emotions. Thankfully, Hillary Clinton and Kate McKinnon are here to brighten your day with their unending, enviable friendship. The former presidential candidate and the Saturday Night Live star were spotted getting dinner at Manhattan hot spot Orso, Page Six reports. Eyewitnesses of this magical dinner date said there was lots of laughter coming from their table. (Jealous.) Advertisement - Continue Reading Below My friend is eating dinner next to @HillaryClinton and Kate McKinnon right now. This is not a drill. #ImWithHer 
— Sara Marino (@smarino92) February 15, 2017 Most Popular And yes, there are pictures. So Hillary Clinton had dinner with Kate McKinnon last night https://t.co/aaRZgXq6Hb pic.twitter.com/HHp3xjOzBf 
— Kyle Griffin (@kylegriffin1) February 17, 2017 After dinner, Clinton attended Broadway's Sunset Boulevard at New York's Palace Theatre (without McKinnon), where she got a standing ovation. 
— Logan Culwell-Block (@loganculwell) February 16, 2017 Unfortunately we are left only to imagine what exactly Clinton and McKinnon discussed during dinner—but here's hoping it was something fun, like fixing our country or who should play Steve Bannon on SNL .
